@Version(value="1.5.1")

Package io.wcm.handler.media.markup

Default media markup builder implementations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractImageMediaMarkupBuilder
    Shared functionality for MediaMarkupBuilder image implementations.
    DummyImageMediaMarkupBuilder
    Generates a simple dummy image as edit placeholder in WCM edit mode, if no media item is set.
    DummyResponsiveImageMediaMarkupBuilder Deprecated
    Use responsive image handling methods for image sizes and picture sources from MediaBuilder.
    MediaMarkupBuilderUtil
    Helper methods for MediaMarkupBuilder implementations.
    ResponsiveImageMediaMarkupBuilder Deprecated
    Use responsive image handling methods for image sizes and picture sources from MediaBuilder together with SimpleImageMediaMarkupBuilder.
    SimpleImageMediaMarkupBuilder
    Basic implementation of MediaMarkupBuilder for images.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DragDropSupport
    Controls whether the markup builder should apply drag&drop support for the rendered markup.
    IPERatioCustomize
    Controls whether the list of IPE cropping ratios is customized by the media handler to match with the ratios of the selected media formats.

Package io.wcm.handler.media.markup Description

Default media markup builder implementations.
